segments.text: What kind of car is best for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For you , I would recommend this one here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The compact ? Why do you think that one is better than the others ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This automobile is just right for your needs because not only is it compact for ease in city driving , but also , it has many safety features . I know that as a parent , you are concerned about safety in driving your kids to and from school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's true . What kind of safety features are we talking about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This model features anti-lock brakes , airbags on both driver and passenger sides , and impact collision design . But that's not all . This car isn't only safe but it's also very economical .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean it has a cheaper price than similar models ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this price is very affordable , but driving this car you'll also notice a significant annual saving in gas consumption . The main attraction for this model is the fuel economy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With the cost of gasoline these days , that is a big plus . I think this model may be just what I'm looking for .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you take it for a test drive , and think it over .
segments.speaker: S2
